page.title: 03USE OF MEDIA
page.content: {Radio.}Most people have a radio and like to listen to Radio 1 especially Jimmy Savile's programme. {T.V.}For news,people prefer I.T.V.but on B.B.C. Wogan and Dallas are best.Most people watch T.V. 3 hours a day. {Videos.}Only a few people have videos to record programmes and not films. {Newspapers.}Most people get the STAR as their daily paper but many don't get an evening paper.They get the CASTLEFORD AND PONTEFRACT EXPRESS. {Magazines.}The majority of people asked get at least 1 magazine per week. {Books.}Many people like to read,either buying books or borrowing from the library. {Most people would like more local news {from the television.
